reviews.review: How could I say no to this game?
This game lives up to all the hype it generated, plus some. The only game with realistic physics that can even compete with this is Amnesia. Idk what else to say.

This game is great! It's fun, action packed, and not extremely challenging (there are difficulty settings, I play on normal). The game also doesn't require a strong computer either. If your computer can play Gmod it can probably play Half-Life 2. Half-Life 2 is overall a great game and if you're thinking about getting it, do it.

Решил пройти Half-Life 2, думал прохождение займет пару часов, как первый портал... НО тут оказывается, что прохожу игру уже 10 часов, а прошел только около половины игры, к тому же экшен не убавляется, его становится еще больше! Одним словом игра - легенда! Кто не проходил, вообще не понимаю как можно было такое упустить.

Its a very good game. I waiting till Half-Life: Alyx comes out, I just wanna finish the game before Half-Life: Alyx released. I would recommend you play this game. If you want to play Half-Life: Alyx, but haven't played this game yet, I would recommend you to play it before.
At the time this came out, it was on the vanguard.  Still a good nostalgic visit to the era.
Amazing game with great visuals, story and characters! The sequel to the greatest game of all time does not fail to impress in every aspect, and the graphics still look incredible to this day.

hl2.. What a game. This is one of the games that anyone who has a PC and Steam, has to play. It was revolutionary for its time, and is still one heck of a game.

Physics act as they should, Graphics are what they are, but still competitive, Even some AAA don't have the facial animations that HL2 has, and gameplay is dated, but fun.

Seriously, this is the game that everyone should play at some point. It made a mark in video game history, and so did HL1 and Doom 1998 for example.

And how does the storytelling hold up? It's a masterpiece. Instead of plain, boring exposition, it adopts more of a show, not tell way of storytelling. And the story itself is fantastic, even if you have not played the original HL1. If you are interested in HL1, but you don't want the 90's graphics, i suggest Black Mesa, as it's a great remake of the original one, but if you wan't to go full retro, get the original HL1. It's only 8€, and is still a good experience, and get more of the story.

So, do i recommend it? Heck yeah.

1. Great story
2. Great graphic (for my opinion)
3. Gravity gun is so god damn fun
Honestly, the best game ever made. 10/10 would blow the citadel again.

Half-Life 2 is an amazing game and I believe that everyone should play this game just to try it. The way the game tells a story is incredible, the world building is great, and the game accomplishes what it is trying to do. I think that the vehicle sequences in the game in Water Hazard and Highway 17 are the worst parts of the game, but they are still enjoyable. The Gravity gun is very fun to use, especially at the end of the game when it gets supercharged. If you are thinking about trying Half-Life, you absolutely should, it is an experience that every person should have the chance to try.
